content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][block_title title=”ITES 3S: W52P1J-18-D-A128″][/block_title][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs style=”modern” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”About ITES-3s” tab_id=”1691586305361-218fa871-2f22″][vc_column_text]Contract Number: W52P1J-18-D-A128

The objective of the ITES-3S contract is to meet the Army’s enterprise infrastructure and info structure goals with a full range of innovative, world-class Information Technology (IT) support services and solutions at a fair and reasonable price. ITES-3S is a multiple award, ID/IQ contract vehicle. It is the Army’s primary source of IT-related services worldwide. All DOD and other Federal agencies are authorized to use the contracts to satisfy their IT requirements. The ITES-3 contract is the Army’s preferred source for the purchase of a full range of services and solutions within CONUS and OCONUS. The IT services solutions include but are not limited to the following Task Areas:

ITES 3S TASK AREAS

Business Process Reengineering (BPR)

Information Systems Security

Information Assurance

Information Technology Services

Enterprise Design, Integration, and Consolidation

Education/Training

Program/Project Management

Systems Operation and Maintenance

Network Support

Point of Contact:

Patty Wright, Sr. Program Manager
Patty@osigov.com
Tel: 801-791-2879

Amit Malhotra, Program Executive
amit@osigov.com
Tel: 703-230-7802[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Ordering Information” tab_id=”1691586305361-05287704-3b04″][vc_column_text]Ordering under the contract is decentralized and all Federal Contracting Officers are delegated procurement authority to place task orders against this contract. No agency pass-through or service fees are associated with this contract. Individual task orders will be awarded by the Ordering Contracting Officers. The Army’s complete instructions and requirements for the use of the ITES-3S contract are available and maintained online by PEO EIS at the CHESS IT e-mart, https://chess.army.mil. This site provides the authoritative ITES-3S Ordering Guidelines, forms, example Statements of Work (SOW), Performance Work Statements (PWS) and Statements of Objectives (SOO), formats, and other useful links to aid order development.

Contract Types:

  • Firm-Fixed-Price (FFP)
  • Time-and-Materials (T&M)
  • Cost-Reimbursement (CR)

Benefits of Using ITES-3S

  • No fees associated with the contract
  • Decentralized Ordering
  • Open to all Army, DoD and Federal Agencies

Contract Ceiling Value: $12,100,000,000.00

Ordering Period of Performance:

  • Base Period: 7 January 2019 – 6 January 2024
  • Option Period 1: 7 January 2024 – 6 January 2025
  • Option Period 2: 7 January 2025 – 6 January 2026
  • Option Period 3: 7 January 2026 – 6 January 2027
  • Option Period 4: 7 January 2027 – 6 January 2028

Download: Ordering Guide[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
